meanings.meaning_en_US: The fifth month of the year.

examples.sentence: May is known for its flowers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 五月以花朵而聞名

examples.sentence: The holiday falls in [May].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 假日落在五月

examples.sentence: We celebrate Labor Day in [May].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在五月慶祝勞動節

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ninth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [September].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在[九月]。

examples.sentence: The season begins in early [September].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 季節在[九月]初開始。

examples.sentence: School starts in [September] every year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每年[九月]開學。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device used for viewing programs, movies, or broadcasts.

examples.sentence: I love watching my favorite show on [TV].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在電視上看我最喜歡的節目。

examples.sentence: The [TV] broadcasted the news every hour.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個電視每小時播報新聞。

examples.sentence: He bought a new [TV] for the living room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為客廳買了一台新電視。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The fourth month of the year.

examples.sentence: April is known for its showers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 四月以其春雨著稱。

examples.sentence: The flowers bloom in [April].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 花在四月綻放。

examples.sentence: Tax returns are due in [April].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報稅是在四月到期。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week following Saturday and preceding Monday.

examples.sentence: We always have family brunch on [Sunday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們總是在星期天舉行家庭早午餐

examples.sentence: Many people go to church on [Sunday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人在星期天去教堂

examples.sentence: I like to relax on [Sunday] before the work week starts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在星期天放鬆，為工作周做準備

meanings.meaning_en_US: The seventh month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, consisting of 31 days.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [July].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在七月。

examples.sentence: Independence Day is celebrated on [July] 4th in the United States.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 獨立日是在美國的七月四日慶祝的。

examples.sentence: [July] is often hot in many places.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 七月在很多地方通常都很熱。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to indicate the time on the hour.

examples.sentence: The meeting starts at 3 [o’clock].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議在三點整開始。

examples.sentence: Please be here by 10 [o’clock].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在十點整前到這裡。

examples.sentence: It is 5 [o’clock] now.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 現在是五點整。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The third month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [March].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在三月

examples.sentence: [March] often brings the first signs of spring.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 三月通常帶來春天的最初跡象

examples.sentence: The event will take place in [March].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該活動將於三月舉行

meanings.meaning_en_US: A title used before the surname or full name of a man.

examples.sentence: Please help me, [Mister]!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請幫我，先生！

examples.sentence: Mr. Smith is a respectable [Mister] in our town.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 史密斯先生是我們鎮上一位受人尊敬的先生。

examples.sentence: Excuse me, [Mister], do you have the time?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不好意思，先生，你知道幾點了嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week following Monday and preceding Wednesday.

examples.sentence: Our meeting is scheduled for [Tuesday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們的會議定在星期二。

examples.sentence: I always enjoy taco night on [Tuesday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是喜歡星期二的玉米餅之夜。

examples.sentence: She has a yoga class every [Tuesday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每個星期二都有瑜伽課。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week before Saturday.

examples.sentence: I usually go out on [Friday] nights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我通常在星期五晚上出門。

examples.sentence: The meeting is scheduled for [Friday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議定於星期五舉行。

examples.sentence: [Friday] is the last weekday before the weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 星期五是周末前的最後一個工作日。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period of 24 hours as a unit of time.

examples.sentence: There are seven [days] in a week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一週有七天。

examples.sentence: She spent many [days] traveling across Europe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她花了很多天在歐洲旅行。

examples.sentence: The [days] are getting longer as summer approaches.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 隨著夏天的到來，白天越來越長。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A high-ranking official in the Catholic Church, typically a member of the clergy.

examples.sentence: The [Cardinal] spoke at the Vatican.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位紅衣主教在梵蒂岡發表演講。

examples.sentence: A [Cardinal] is known for his red robes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 紅衣主教以他的紅色長袍而聞名。

examples.sentence: He was appointed as a [Cardinal] by the Pope.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他被教宗任命為紅衣主教。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The fifth day of the week, following Wednesday and preceding Friday.

examples.sentence: We have a meeting scheduled for [Thursday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們的會議定在星期四。

examples.sentence: Thursday is my favorite day of the week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 星期四是我最喜歡的一天。

examples.sentence: I always do laundry on [Thursday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是在星期四洗衣服。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the company of; accompanied by.

examples.sentence: I went to the movies [with] my friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我和朋友一起去看電影。

examples.sentence: She is studying [with] a professor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和一位教授一起學習。

examples.sentence: You can come [with] us if you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你願意，可以和我們一起來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Expressing the future tense or intention.

examples.sentence: I [will] go to the store tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我明天會去商店

examples.sentence: She [will] finish her homework later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她稍後會完成她的作業

examples.sentence: They [will] join us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們會和我們一起吃晚餐

meanings.meaning_en_US: To look for or seek something or someone.

examples.sentence: I will [search] for the missing keys.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會搜尋丟失的鑰匙。

examples.sentence: She began to [search] online for information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她開始上網搜尋資訊。

examples.sentence: They [search] the area for any signs of life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們搜尋該地區是否有生命的跡象。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to ask for information about something.

examples.sentence: What do you want to eat?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你想吃什麼？

examples.sentence: What is your favorite color?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你最喜歡的顏色是什麼？

examples.sentence: What happened last night?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 昨晚發生了什麼？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A question word used to ask about one or more items from a defined set.

examples.sentence: Do you know [which] book he prefers?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道他偏好哪本書嗎？

examples.sentence: I can't remember [which] way to go.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我記不起來該走哪條路

examples.sentence: She asked [which] dress to wear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她問該穿哪條裙子

meanings.meaning_en_US: At what time.

examples.sentence: I remember the day [when] we first met.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我記得我們第一次見面的那一天

examples.sentence: Please let me know [when] you arrive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請告訴我你什麼時候到達

examples.sentence: Do you know [when] the event starts?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道活動什麼時候開始嗎？
